oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The use of natural herbs and berries for preservation of organic meat products: Evaluation of the antimicrobial effect in different test models
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hansen, Flemming
Jensen, Martin
Grevsen, Kai
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper reports th escreening of 365 different plants using Radial Diffusion Assay, and subsequent testing in other Laboratory models moving closer to a real meat product. The applicability of different test models in relation to the intended use of the antimicrobial plants is discussed and the possible use of the investigated plants as replacement for sodium nitrite in meat products is reported.
